tests.query:
-- Tags: zookeeper

create table rmt1 (d DateTime, n int) engine=ReplicatedMergeTree('/test/01165/{database}/rmt', '1') order by n partition by toYYYYMMDD(d);
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query: create table rmt2 (d DateTime, n int) engine=ReplicatedMergeTree('/test/01165/{database}/rmt', '2') order by n partition by toYYYYMMDD(d);
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query:
-- { clientError 36 }
insert into rmt1(n) select * from system.numbers limit arrayJoin([1, 2]);
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query:
-- { serverError 36, 440 }
insert into rmt1 values (now(), rand());
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query: select lost_part_count from system.replicas where database = currentDatabase() and table = 'rmt2';
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query: select count() from system.text_log where logger_name like '%' || currentDatabase() || '%' and message ilike '%table with non-zero lost_part_count equal to%';
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query: create table rmt1 (d DateTime, n int) engine=ReplicatedMergeTree('/test/01165/{database}/rmt', '1') order by n partition by tuple();
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query: create table rmt2 (d DateTime, n int) engine=ReplicatedMergeTree('/test/01165/{database}/rmt', '2') order by n partition by tuple();
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query: select lost_part_count from system.replicas where database = currentDatabase() and table = 'rmt2';
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query: select count() from system.text_log where logger_name like '%' || currentDatabase() || '%' and message ilike '%table with non-zero lost_part_count equal to%';
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.query: create table rmt1 (n UInt8, m Int32, d Date, t DateTime) engine=ReplicatedMergeTree('/test/01165/{database}/rmt', '1') order by n partition by (n, m, d, t);
tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql

tests.name: 01165_lost_part_empty_partition.sql
